text: 1.68-70: Sng 41.13; 72.18; 106.48; Ru 7.161.68-70: Sng 18.2; Jer 23.5-6; Dan 9.24; FG 3.21; Ro 1.2“Fhe Bakɨme fhum guarara mba kamen wo kamthooŋ gumgir ŋaari ga suaŋgim, mbe ne bun suaŋgi. Nza Isreriŋ Guma Bakɨme zɨ ndiv vun kuamkuarga. Ana taagip wo gumgi gu mbigi ndir saŋv zɨrga. Ana won ŋaara guma Devit, anan nzɨga mbe taagi nza ndirga guman ŋkasŋka the tegɨrga. Ne ntige khar hɨr za mbui.
